name: Glitch Garden (course game)
description:
This is an in lane tower defense game. Click the character buttons at the bottom and then place them onto the play grid in game to spawn your defenders. They all have a star cost. Do not let the lizards or foxes destroy your star generators. Good luck.

Made following the course Unity Developer 2D: Learn to Code Making Games by Rick Davidson and Ben Tristem.

Assets from the free released assets by Tiny Speck from Glitch. 

https://www.glitchthegame.com/public-domain-game-art/

As an extra step to myself upon completion of a section I upload it to Itch to practice the unique aspects of publishing a game and getting it working right on the web.

Gnomes cost says 40 but is 50. Oops! This was a tutorial game so I do not think I will rebuild for this fix (among many other things). Thank you for taking the time to read and play.
